016
017package org.parboiled.support;
018
019import org.parboiled.Context;
020import org.parboiled.Node;
021import org.parboiled.Rule;
022import org.parboiled.common.Predicate;
023import org.parboiled.common.Predicates;
024import org.parboiled.common.Tuple2;
025import org.parboiled.matchers.Matcher;
026
027import java.util.HashSet;
028import java.util.Set;
029
030import static imagingbook.parboiled.matchers.MatcherUtils.unwrap;
031import static imagingbook.parboiled.trees.GraphUtils.hasChildren;
032
033public class Filters {
034
035    /**
036     * A predicate for Node tree printing, suppresses printing of parse tree nodes for Optional rules that
037     * do not have sub nodes.
038     */
039    public static final Predicate<Node<Object>> SKIP_EMPTY_OPTS = new Predicate<Node<Object>>() {
040        public boolean apply(Node<Object> node) {
041            return hasChildren(node) || node.getEndIndex() != node.getStartIndex() ||
042                    !"Optional".equals(node.getLabel());
043        }
044    };
045
046    /**
047     * A predicate for Node tree printing, suppresses printing of parse tree nodes for ZeroOrMore rules that
048     * do not have sub nodes.
049     */
050    public static final Predicate<Node<Object>> SKIP_EMPTY_ZOMS = new Predicate<Node<Object>>() {
051        public boolean apply(Node<Object> node) {
052            return hasChildren(node) || node.getEndIndex() != node.getStartIndex() ||
053                    !"ZeroOrMore".equals(node.getLabel());
054        }
055    };
056
057    /**
058     * A predicate for Node tree printing, suppresses printing of parse tree nodes for Optional and ZeroOrMore rules
059     * that do not have sub nodes.
060     */
061    public static final Predicate<Node<Object>> SKIP_EMPTY_OPTS_AND_ZOMS =
062            Predicates.and(SKIP_EMPTY_OPTS, SKIP_EMPTY_ZOMS);
063
064    /**
065     * A predicate for rule tree printing. Prevents SOEs by detecting and suppressing loops in the rule tree.
066     *
067     * @return a predicate
068     */
069    public static Predicate<Matcher> preventLoops() {
070        return new Predicate<Matcher>() {
071            private final Set<Matcher> visited = new HashSet<Matcher>();
072
073            public boolean apply(Matcher node) {
074                node = unwrap(node);
075                if (visited.contains(node)) {
076                    return false;
077                }
078                visited.add(node);
079                return true;
080            }
081        };
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * A predicate usable as a filter (element) of a {@link org.parboiled.parserunners.TracingParseRunner}.
086     * Enables printing of rule tracing log messages for all input in the given range of input lines.
087     *
088     * @param firstLine the number of the first input line to generate tracing message for
089     * @param lastLine  the number of the last input line to generate tracing message for
090     * @return a predicate
091     */
092    public static Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>> lines(final int firstLine, final int lastLine) {
093        return new Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>>() {
094            public boolean apply(Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean> tuple) {
095                int line = tuple.a.getInputBuffer().getPosition(tuple.a.getCurrentIndex()).line;
096                return firstLine <= line && line <= lastLine;
097            }
098        };
099    }
100
101    /**
102     * A predicate usable as a filter (element) of a {@link org.parboiled.parserunners.TracingParseRunner}.
103     * Enables printing of rule tracing log messages for all input in the given range of input lines.
104     *
105     * @param firstLine the number of the first input line to generate tracing message for
106     * @return a predicate
107     */
108    public static Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>> fromLine(final int firstLine) {
109        return new Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>>() {
110            public boolean apply(Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean> tuple) {
111                return tuple.a.getInputBuffer().getPosition(tuple.a.getCurrentIndex()).line >= firstLine;
112            }
113        };
114    }
115
116    /**
117     * A predicate usable as a filter (element) of a {@link org.parboiled.parserunners.TracingParseRunner}.
118     * Enables printing of rule tracing log messages for all input in the given range of input lines.
119     *
120     * @param lastLine  the number of the last input line to generate tracing message for
121     * @return a predicate
122     */
123    public static Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>> untilLine(final int lastLine) {
124        return new Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>>() {
125            public boolean apply(Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean> tuple) {
126                return tuple.a.getInputBuffer().getPosition(tuple.a.getCurrentIndex()).line <= lastLine;
127            }
128        };
129    }
130
131    /**
132     * A predicate usable as a filter (element) of a {@link org.parboiled.parserunners.TracingParseRunner}.
133     * Enables printing of rule tracing log messages for all given rules and their sub rules.
134     *
135     * @param rules the rules to generate tracing message for
136     * @return a predicate
137     */
138    public static Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>> rules(final Rule... rules) {
139        return new Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>>() {
140            public boolean apply(Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean> tuple) {
141                MatcherPath path = tuple.a.getPath();
142                for (Rule rule : rules) if (path.contains((Matcher) rule)) return true;
143                return false;
144            }
145        };
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * A predicate usable as a filter (element) of a {@link org.parboiled.parserunners.TracingParseRunner}.
150     * Enables printing of rule tracing log messages for all given rules (without their sub rules).
151     *
152     * @param rules the rules to generate tracing message for
153     * @return a predicate
154     */
155    public static Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>> onlyRules(final Rule... rules) {
156        return new Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>>() {
157            public boolean apply(Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean> tuple) {
158                for (Rule rule : rules) if (tuple.a.getMatcher() == rule) return true;
159                return false;
160            }
161        };
162    }
163
164    /**
165     * A predicate usable as a filter (element) of a {@link org.parboiled.parserunners.TracingParseRunner}.
166     * Enables printing of rule tracing log messages for all sub rules of the given rules.
167     *
168     * @param rules the rules whose sub rules to generate tracing message for
169     * @return a predicate
170     */
171    public static Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>> rulesBelow(final Rule... rules) {
172        return new Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>>() {
173            public boolean apply(Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean> tuple) {
174                MatcherPath path = tuple.a.getPath();
175                for (Rule rule : rules) {
176                    Matcher matcher = (Matcher) rule;
177                    if (tuple.a.getMatcher() != matcher && path.contains(matcher)) return true;
178                }
179                return false;
180            }
181        };
182    }
183
184    /**
185     * A predicate usable as a filter (element) of a {@link org.parboiled.parserunners.TracingParseRunner}.
186     * Enables printing of rule tracing log messages for all matched rules.
187     *
188     * @return a predicate
189     */
190    public static Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>> onlyMatches() {
191        return new Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>>() {
192            public boolean apply(Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean> tuple) {
193                return tuple.b;
194            }
195        };
196    }
197
198    /**
199     * A predicate usable as a filter (element) of a {@link org.parboiled.parserunners.TracingParseRunner}.
200     * Enables printing of rule tracing log messages for all mismatched rules.
201     *
202     * @return a predicate
203     */
204    public static Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>> onlyMismatches() {
205        return new Predicate<Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean>>() {
206            public boolean apply(Tuple2<Context<?>, Boolean> tuple) {
207                return !tuple.b;
208            }
209        };
210    }
211
212}
